Translations.Text: wa-udh'kuru idh jaʿalakum khulafaa min baʿdi ʿadin wabawwa-akum fi l-ardi tattakhidhuna min suhuliha qusuran watanhituna l-jibala buyutan fa-udh'kuru alaa l-lahi wala taʿthaw fi l-ardi muf'sidina
qala l-mala-u alladhina is'takbaru min qawmihi lilladhina us'tud'ʿifu liman amana min'hum ataʿlamuna anna salihan mur'salun min rabbihi qalu inna bima ur'sila bihi mu'minuna
qala alladhina is'takbaru inna bi-alladhi amantum bihi kafiruna
faʿaqaru l-naqata waʿataw ʿan amri rabbihim waqalu yasalihu i'tina bima taʿiduna in kunta mina l-mur'salina
fa-akhadhathumu l-rajfatu fa-asbahu fi darihim jathimina
fatawalla ʿanhum waqala yaqawmi laqad ablaghtukum risalata rabbi wanasahtu lakum walakin la tuhibbuna l-nasihina
walutan idh qala liqawmihi atatuna l-fahishata ma sabaqakum biha min ahadin mina l-ʿalamina
innakum latatuna l-rijala shahwatan min duni l-nisai bal antum qawmun mus'rifuna
